title: Resize-able Client window
body:
Hello all,
While I mostly play league on my PC, I found that playing on my laptop is a little bit hard, the window for the alpha league client is not resize-able, meaning it all ways goes a bit off the screen. Just an idea to put out there, the current client is not resize-able either and sometimes. Just to be clear I am not talking about the actual game, this is the client. Now I am unsure of any option I can use to change, so if there is one please let me know.

Happy Testing,
DrakePlayz

replies.body: i agree, i was hoping for a full screen client (without changing my desktop res) even if i could just resize it to full screen
some may find it an inconvenience but others may not, that's why it would be a user select "option" to go full screen

I have been saying this ever since the alpha client has been released. I have a 27inch monitor and it is just so small, I would like it not to be fullscreened but to have the option to maximize the client window, or for it to be resizeable so I am able to adjust it to fit my screen. Still waiting for Riot to reply to me, it has been months, no reply :(

EDIT: Should we post up a poll on the alpha client/normal boards and see if we can get a following on this? Hopefully then Riot will respond.

There currently isn't an option in the Alpha Client itself to resize and, going back through a couple of the past discussions, not much has been said by the design team on this issue.

Hopefully resizing does get incorporated into this client, but I'm not holding my breath .

Try adjusting the your resolution (higher) and see if that helps.

Windows:
1. Open Control Panel. (View by: Category)
2. Under _Appearances and Personalization_, click on _Adjust screen resolution_.
3. Change your resolution.
